channel.title: Aleahim - iOS Development Blog
channel.description: Technical articles on Swift, OpenAPI, and iOS development by Mihaela Mihaljević Jakić

item.title: Cupertino v0.9: Multi-Agent Support and MCP Protocol Upgrade
item.description: Cupertino now works with OpenAI Codex, Cursor, VS Code Copilot, Zed, Windsurf, and opencode. Plus MCP protocol upgrade to 2025-06-18.

item.title: Cupertino v0.8.0: AST Indexing and a Major Architecture Refactor
item.description: SwiftSyntax enables semantic code search. A deep refactoring of the codebase delivers cleaner results and better AI capabilities.

item.title: Cupertino v0.7.0: 302K Docs, OS Version Filtering, and Teaching AI to Dig Deeper
item.description: The complete Apple documentation crawl is done. Now you can filter by iOS 17+ and Claude finally knows where to look for answers.

item.title: Cupertino v0.5.0: 234K Docs, 287 Frameworks, and the Roadmap Ahead
item.description: The biggest documentation update yet - nearly double the docs, plus what's coming next for the Apple documentation MCP server.

item.title: Cupertino v0.4.0: HIG Support, Framework Aliases, and Release Engineering Lessons
item.description: New features for Apple documentation search, plus a cautionary tale about release processes and why order matters when tagging.

item.title: Cupertino v0.3.4: One-Line Install & 150K+ Apple Docs
item.description: Install Cupertino with a single command - signed, notarized, and ready in seconds. Now with 150,000+ Apple documentation pages.

item.title: Cupertino v0.3.0: From 20 Hours to 30 Seconds
item.description: The new setup command downloads pre-built databases instantly - no more crawling Apple's documentation for hours

item.title: Cupertino: 27 Issues Down, Just Getting Started
item.description: From MCP server to a complete Apple documentation ecosystem with pre-crawled docs and 606 sample projects

item.title: Cupertino: Offline Apple Documentation for AI Agents
item.description: An MCP server that gives Claude Desktop offline access to 22,000+ Apple documentation pages

item.title: Building a Concurrency-Safe Bearer Token Middleware for Swift OpenAPI Clients
item.description: Elegant, Thread-Safe Authentication for OpenAPI Runtime

item.title: From ExtremePackaging to OpenAPI Integration
item.description: Building a Full OpenAPI Workflow on Top of the Extreme Packaging Architecture

item.title: Introducing OpenAPILoggingMiddleware
item.description: Elegant, Structured Request Logging for OpenAPI-Driven Swift Servers

item.title: ExtremePackaging
item.description: Example of Extreme Packaging in Swift

item.title: CVBuilder: A Swift Package for Professional CV Management
item.description: A Swift package for building and rendering CVs in multiple formats

item.title: Bringing Advanced SwiftUI Animations to macOS
item.description: A port of SwiftUILab's Advanced Animations that also supports macOS

item.title: Core Animation Layers forming a 3D cube
